tab1.text1:
Matrix was created because I'm fed up with all the servers that impose 10/15/20 ..... rules ingame, it's unbearable, it's a game and we want to relax. I rent a very powerful host to offer you a stable servers. I hope you have a good time, we have a community that helps each other with respect. Neo.


Shop&Kits in F2, For consol player go in Tab SHOP.
/kit 01 : Kit starter
Player LVL : 116
Dinos  LVL : 600 After tame 900
Finder dino in your inventory / map / open finder


XP: 10x
Taming: 20x
Harvesting: 100x
Creature Maturation: 10x
Breeding Interval: 10x



Have fun ...

tab2.text1: You can build anywhere, but not too close to other players.

tab3.text1:
Shop for console players, you have all codes to buy kits.
Every 20 minutes, you have a message in the global chat with your amount of points.

     Starter kit (3 free): /kit 01

     How buy kit. Example Kit UltimateTekPlot
     /buy 20 1
